#general

Function run on the client side connected to the behaviour of the registration
site.

#validate

Checks the password and the repeat password fields.

As long as the password is under 4 characters displays an error with the
text: The password must be at least 4 characters long!

As long as the first criteria is matched and the passwords don't match it
displays: The passwords don't match.

After both criteria are met it enables the submit button and displays no text.
